query:
SELECT
                l.id,
                l.name,
                COUNT(lm.user_id) AS count,
                SUM(
                    CASE WHEN EXISTS (
                        SELECT 1
                        FROM emails e
                        WHERE e.user_id = u.id
                          AND e.list_id = l.id
                          AND e.post_id = ?
                          AND e.sent_at IS NOT NULL
                    )
                    THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
                ) AS sent
            FROM lists l
            LEFT JOIN list_members lm ON lm.list_id = l.id
            LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id = lm.user_id
            GROUP BY l.id;
